text:
Stretch your hands by putting out your arm in front of you with the inside of your hand up. 
 Then with the other hand grab the fingers and stretch them downwards. 
 Keep this up for the set amount of time.
Put up your hand above your head. Put them together and stretch them.

Lie on the ground. 
 Put one of your knees near your chest and hold for the time. 
 Afterwards do it for the other side.
Stand and keep your legs streight. Try to grab your feet :foot:.
